Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time for Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across all process variants where it occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Total time between Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the subsequent Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in variants containing a re-submission loop
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average cycle time of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER when followed by a re-submission versus when it terminates the case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time between Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the next occurrence of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Minimum time for Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in cases that eventually reach Payment Handled
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to Payment Handled in successful re-submission paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time spent in Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER relative to the total duration of variants that include pre-approver involvement
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurs

Name: Cycle time of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER compared to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to case termination in unsuccessful variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Total time between Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in rework loops
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum time required to complete the entire process after Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER when the employee re-submits within two months (as per reimbursement policy)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average waiting time to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in 2017 versus 2018 data
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
